_comments.terminals: List of terminal applications to show in picker (in order). Only installed apps will be shown.
_comments.editors: List of editor applications. If multiple editors are configured, you'll be asked to choose. Set to empty list [] to disable editor prompts. Set to single-item list to skip picker dialog.
_comments.logging.level: Log level: DEBUG, INFO, WARNING, ERROR, CRITICAL
_comments.logging.file: Path to log file. Tilde (~) expands to user home directory.
_comments.logging.max_bytes: Maximum size of log file before rotation (in bytes). Default: 1MB
_comments.logging.backup_count: Number of backup log files to keep. Default: 7
_comments.behavior.auto_open_editor: If true, show editor prompt after terminal selection. If false, skip editor entirely.
_comments.behavior.remember_choices: If true, remember last terminal/editor choice per project (Phase 2.4 feature).
